Nightstrike:

"WOA!!!!" screamed wondered Nightstrike"I've never seen something 
like that"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> Seeing IR transforming back into her robot mode, Prowl does the 
same,
> flying out of the way of Nightstrike. He feels his mind being
> overwhelmed by all the stuff that IR was experiencing, and flies
> backwards, resisting the urge to grip his head. Through half-closed
> optics, Prowl sees the emergy go at Megatron, and his systems begin 
to
> deal with the rush from IR.
> 
> He looks down at his mate to see her as Arkness Prime, feeling pride
> but also a bit sorry that she was now so much stronger than him. But
> it didn't matter. She was the maximal commander, and she deserved to
> be good. He just hoped that this would take care of Megatron.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> > 
> > * Iron Raptor breathed hard, holding her sword as steadily as she
> could.
> > That fight with FireBlade had taken alot out of her, but as long 
as
> it was 
> > one less enemy the Maximals had to be threatened with, who cared?
> > Suddenly her muscles tensed and she turned on her heel, the claws 
of
> her 
> > foot armor grinding into the ground.  Her scanners homed in on a
> streak of 
> > pink heading towards her, her mind numb at what was going on.
> > But nothing was controling her body this time, instead she felt a
> power 
> > pulsating from the very core of her spark.
> > The Matrix had come to life!
> > Power serged inside of her super structure, so much that it almost
> hurt.  
> > Her hands shook, then the rest of her body followed and she nearly
> dropped 
> > her sword.
> > And in one burst, silver flashed wings erupted from her back and
> stratched 
> > out behind her.
> > The last of the dieing sun caught a glint off of them as a red 
light
> began 
> > to pulse at the flat of her chest. The light began to get 
brighter,
> always 
> > pulsating with the beating of a single spark.
> > Though there was no helm, a face-plate detatched from neck armor 
and
> covered 
> > her mouth and nose.
> > And in one swipe of a swords blade, the turrent sent from Megatron
> bounced 
> > away and exploded behind her.*
> > 
> > " MEGATRON!!"
> > 
> > * With ice blue eyes she glared at him. And with a voice directed 
by
> the 
> > Matrix itself, she spoke.*
> > 
> > " I AM ARKNESS PRIME!"
> > 
> > * Gripping the sword with both hands she raised it above her her,
> the tip 
> > pulsating with a bright red light.*
> > 
> > " AND YOU WILL YEALD!!"
> > 
> > * Flipping the blade so that it pointed down, with a will of
> commanders 
> > before her it was stabbed into the ground. Streaks of light 
erupted
> from 
> > theblade and slithered along the ground like bolts of lightening
> from a 
> > thindercloud, cascading towards Magatron. But just before reaching
> him they 
> > shot into the air in straight bars of pure energy by the Matrix's
> will. 
> > Around Megatron them sprouted, growing and reaching for the
> sky...the gap at 
> > the brink...beginning to shrink and close.*
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> >
>
